recipe_overview.description: Creates an advanced content synthesis engine with NLP for summarization, relationship extraction, and knowledge graph construction.

technology_stack.synthesis_engine: NLP, summarization, relationship extraction, knowledge graphs
technology_stack.ai_integration: OpenAI GPT, local LLMs, embedding models, vector search

Extraction of key entities and their relationships
Construction of knowledge graphs to represent information
